title: She's a railroader
creator_credit: Barbara Tranter, John Taylor, Shelah Reljic and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Karen Zaitchik jumps on and off moving boxcars, throws switches, pulls brakes and uncouples freights with ease and confidence. She’s a railroader for CN and that’s what this 21-year-old highly individualistic woman wants out of life for the moment. This colorful short film shows how Karen manages in the traditionally male world of the railroad.
creator_credit_for_label: Barbara Tranter, John Taylor, Shelah Reljic and National Film Board of Canada
